casebody.data:
No. 41,

Misc.

Gallegos v. Colorado. Charles S. Vigil for petitioner. Duke W. Dunbar, Attorney General of Colorado, Frank E. Hickey, Deputy Attorney General, and /. F. Brauer, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Colorado granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
